result.title: Multi-site research design and methodological framework - update M27
result.description: Update of the overall case study framework and methodology, including project-level research questions and the menu of quantitative and qualitative research methods available for data collection on the levels of government (WP4), public health (WP5), community (WP6), and information policy (WP7).
